duties_responsibilities.duty: Produce Canadian French copy for various media formats including product launch campaigns, editorials, sales pitches, event promotions, promotional emails, etc.
Monitor cultural trends to ensure messaging is relevant for the Canada market and aligns with the brand's tone of voice.
Lead all aspects of a project from inception to final stage, including coordinating large-scale content projects and guiding updates to Canadian French content reference materials.
Communicate clearly with team members and stakeholders regarding project status and act as a copywriter advisor for all content being built.
Review and approve the work of other writers, provide training and consultation support to the content team, and support quick turnaround translations for event presentations.
Lead team meetings in the absence of the Translation Manager.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Journalism, Literature, or related field (Translator certification/accreditation required)
